L7p:Comment.stringValue: Policy Fragment: #OTK CIBA User Authentication Status
Fetch and update the User Auth Status. This policy is called from 'OTK CIBA Auth Request ID Validation' as part of the /v2/token service flow.
Auth Time ctx variable - auth_time (optional - epoch time)
Optionally also set - acr_values, response_type, scope_granted, state, salt, nonce
Please ref to 'OTK CIBA Auth Request ID Validation' for the context variables available here.
